member.name: IDxcContainerBuilder.AddPart
member.summary: Adds a part to the container.

member.name: IDxcContainerBuilder.Load
member.summary: Loads a DxilContainer to the builder.

member.name: IDxcContainerBuilder.RemovePart
member.summary: Remove a part from the container.
member.param: The identifier of the part to remove; for example, DXC_PART_PDB.
member.returns: S_OK on success, or DXC_E_MISSING_PART if the part wasn't found, or other standard HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDxcContainerBuilder.SerializeContainer
member.param: A pointer to the variable in which to receive the result.

summary.para: Interface representing the DXC container builder.
To obtain an instance of this interface, call with CLSID_DxcContainerBuilder.
